## Tables

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(gt)
library(flextable)
library(gtExtras)
library(reactable)
```

Here is some data on penguins.

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  slice(1:10) %>% 
  reactable()
```
